= Prerequisites =

The *Eclipse Printers* plug-in requires:

  * Java 1.4 (or higher)
  * Eclipse 3.2 (or higher)

= Installation Instructions =

  # Download the latest release from http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-printers/downloads/list
  # Copy the downloaded JAR file into the 'plugins' directory of your Eclipse installation
  # (Re)Start Eclipse
